ygData.subject: RE: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, wouldn t the same thing have happened once you d finished outfitting your bard completely with Fear items? Fixing up Fear and Hate is just delaying
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Sep 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> that is what the planes are for. when Fear was open (yes it is open now but
> impossible for 40 level 50s) a large majority of 45+ characters was there
> for most of their time, thus freeing up space for spots where they would
> normally take away from the rest of the 40-50 characters. it got us out of
> your way. it also kept me from creating new characters and going after
> items for them (so sue me). before they patched Fear and made it
> impossible, i had no other characters. now i have two. like you said, the

Well, wouldn't the same thing have happened once you'd
finished outfitting your bard completely with Fear items?
Fixing up Fear and Hate is just delaying the inevitable. What
Steven was suggesting was changing the inevitable (i.e. making
it permanent, which may not be the best thing to do).

Of course what this really boils down to is that the servers
are overcrowded, which everyone but Verant admits.

> Shada (wonders how long Talies will let this one go hehe)

Heh heh. :-)

--
John H. Kim
